description._content: Image taken from: Title: "French Enterprise in Africa: the personal narrative of Lieut. Hourst of his exploration of the Niger. Translated by Mrs. A. Bell ... With 190 illustrations and map" Author: HOURST, Émile Auguste Léon. Contributor: MEUGENS, afterwards BELL, Nancy R. E. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010095.g.19." Page: 62 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: Chapman & Hall Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001743448 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
